properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from Provincetown MA to Chatham MA to Nantucket MA out 20 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 18 at 3:07AM EST until February 19 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Boston/Norton MA
properties.description:
* WHAT...Southwest winds 15 to 25 kt with gusts up to 30 kt and
seas 6 to 9 feet expected.

* WHERE...Coastal waters from Provincetown MA to Chatham MA to
Nantucket MA out 20 nm.

* WHEN...Until 7 PM EST Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST WEDNESDAY
